name: TRYP FPV: The Drone Racer Simulator
name_original: TRYP FPV: The Drone Racer Simulator
description:
TRYP FPV is a game changer. This drone FPV simulator has been created to give the most realistic and complete drone FPV piloting experience to everyone : beginners to pro.

The game includes unique features and a lot of inovations like :
> Ready scenarios for cinematic practice, Challenges..
> Ultra advanced physics that will give you real and insane feels of flight
> Gigantic, detailed and beautiful maps with minimap overview.

NEW & UNIQUE FEATURE




We added a new and unique feature : TRYP MODE. It will permit you to fly and practice cinematic flight with awesome and epic performers !
This mode allows you to practice and improve your skills in various Scenarios with motorbikes, racing cars, base jumpers, wingsuits, etc. (and a lot more to come).
Also, TRYP MODE has a challenge system to practice your precision skills in specific places.

Maps are realistic and ultra large. So we added a minimap to let you discover it, find your favorite places or experiences and create your own lines of flight.

MAP OVERVIEW

FEELS OF FLIGHT

To reach the best feels of flight we've made high quality graphics, realistic physics and a polished sound design.
The flight sensation was our priority to give you the most amazing feeling of piloting ever in a simulator.

EPIC RACING

Drone FPV find its origins in races.

TRYP FPV give its own visions of what drone racing could be today = EPIC.
We focused the racing discipline in sensations of speed and height in awesome and realistic environments.

DRONE PRESET

We've prepared bunch of drones'preset to make it easy for you to fly directly with your favorite setup.
Their physics has been validated by the conceptors of the original frames and rotors.
If you want to modify them, simply duplicate a preset and change the parameters as Rotors KV, Cells, Weight, props, etc.

ADVANCED PHYSICS
Physics system include real, complex and precise thrust & air drag & aerodynamics equations.
If you are an advanced user you can reproduce the feeling of your own drone !

EASY SETUP


We made it easy for you to fly with any gamepad or radio controller through a clear guide.

Dear gamer, this simulator has been developped by a passionate team of pilots and gamers, for pro pilots to begginers and for gamers.
You won't count hours exploring big and beautiful maps, discovering new spots, racing, freestyling and practice scenarios and challenges.

Welcome in our vision of the FPV World.
Let's TRYP :)
